title: Promo Codes
subtitle: Manage your discount campaigns and promotional offers
launchNewCampaign: Launch a new campaign to boost your sales.
createSubtitle: Launch a new discount campaign for your customers
promoCodeSubtitle: Customers will enter this code at checkout.
descriptionSubtitle: Internal note about this promo code.
minOrderAmountSubtitle: Only applies if order total is above this.
maxTotalUsesSubtitle: How many times the code can be used in total.
deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this promo code? This action cannot be undone.
autoApplySubtitle: Automatically apply this discount if criteria are met (no code needed).
followersOnlySubtitle: Only users who follow your store can use this code.
newCustomerSubtitle: Only users with no previous delivered orders can use this code.
firstOrderRewardSubtitle: Unlocked only after exactly one delivered order has been made.
weMissYouSubtitle: Win back customers who haven't ordered in a while.
favoriteProductSubtitle: Applies when user has favorited products in cart.
categoryBasedSubtitle: Valid for products in selected categories.
noneSubtitle: No specific rules applied. Valid for all eligible orders.
storeWideSubtitle: Applies automatically to all products and customers in the store.
